name: Defense of the fire
description:
It's a simple 2D action game. You need to defend the fire with wisdom and skill, at the end of each wave, you will be blessed by the fire or be cursed by enemy.

This is also my first game, so I hope you enjoy it and welcome your comments and suggestions.

The game is still a prototype, if you all like it, I'll keep working on it. The future plans include:

  • More monsters
  • More blessings or curses
  • Random events
  • Boss battle
